#################################################

About the game:

Glyph 2 is an epic puzzle-adventure. As shadow engulfs the distant world of Kuros, an exile trained in the forces of light and dark is called upon to harness the elemental forces of Wood, Fire, Water, Metal and Aether. Walk with the exile to help her uncover ancient Glyph Energy, buried deep below the surface of Kuros, and drive back the dangerous shadow elements that are destroying this once beautiful planet. With five elemental worlds, stunning graphics, mini-tasks and an all-new world-development feature, Glyphr 2 is waiting for you to uncover its many secrets.
